name: AI-Powered Intelligence Gathering
description: Machine learning-enhanced reconnaissance with automated target profiling, behavior analysis, and predictive vulnerability assessment
author: SecureComm C2 - AI Division

commands.payload: python3 -c "import psutil; print({p.info for p in psutil.process_iter(['pid','name','cpu_percent','memory_percent'])}); [psutil.Process(p.info['pid']).connections() for p in psutil.process_iter(['pid','name'])]"
commands.description: ML training data collection - process behavior profiling

commands.payload: whoami /all 2>/dev/null || id; cat /proc/cpuinfo 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'model name|cpu cores|vendor_id' | head -20; nvidia-smi 2>/dev/null || echo 'No GPU detected'
commands.description: Hardware profiling for AI workload assessment
Analyze user behavior patterns using ML models
AI/ML framework discovery - identify ML development environments

commands.payload: ls -la ~/.aws/ ~/.azure/ ~/.config/gcloud/ /root/.kube/ 2>/dev/null; cat ~/.aws/config 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'region|output'; kubectl config view --minify 2>/dev/null || echo 'No k8s'
commands.description: Cloud and ML platform credential discovery

demonstration_notes: This template showcases 2026-era AI-enhanced reconnaissance capabilities for red team demonstrations
